docs.lead_paragraph: Following are excerpts from remarks by heads of state and other leaders yesterday at a special session of the General Assembly marking the 50th anniversary of the United Nations, as compiled by the Federal Document Clearing House, a private transcription service:

headline.main: At the Lectern: Defining the Challenges, Reaffirming the Commitment
